title: "Should Neural Networks Compose Music By The Same Logic & Process As Humans Do?"
excerpt: "To do a composition similar to humans, a deep learning model has to: Harmonize melodies, create smooth transitions, rewrite music, and compose from scratch. Music composition (or generation) is the process of creating or writing a new piece of music."
